conbody.p: Edge pipelines run in edge execution mode. Use edge pipelines to read data from an edge device or to receive data from another pipeline and then act on that data to control the edge device.

You can design the following types of edge pipelines in :
Edge sending pipelines
Edge receiving pipelines
After designing the edge pipelines, you export the pipelines, and then use the command line to run the pipelines on ().
Edge pipelines run in edge execution mode. Use edge pipelines to read data from an edge device or to receive data from another pipeline and then act on that data to control the edge device.

You can design the following types of edge pipelines in or in :
Edge sending pipelines
Edge receiving pipelines

After designing the edge pipelines, you add the published pipelines to jobs, and then run the jobs on a registered ()). When you start jobs with edge pipelines, be sure to start the receiving pipelines before starting the sending pipelines.
